pullrequest.title: Minor fixes to allow Gazebo to compile on Windows and work with Windows paths.

content.raw: Thanks for these fixes! It looks like there's some tabs mixed in with these changes. We will need to convert the tabs to spaces before merging. We will take care of it if you don't have a chance.
content.html: Thanks for these fixes! It looks like there's some tabs mixed in with these changes. We will need to convert the tabs to spaces before merging. We will take care of it if you don't have a chance.
